name: Starfish Yeet
description:
Starfish YEET is a simple arcade-style game where you YEET a purple starfish to collect points and avoid dangerous sea creatures.

This is my very first completed video game project, created using GML coding language in GameMaker Studio 2. I created this game simply as an exercise. Rather than focusing on large, lofty goals, I set out to make a simple game that could be completed in a short amount of time. This project took around 2 weeks to complete, and I'm rather happy with the results.

I view the game more as a "sketch" than anything - something to work on for fun, to complete, then move on to a new simple project. Eventually I will aim to make something bigger with potential for monetization, but that goal is far off from the present.
